title: Proportion
text: Represent the time interval as a proportion.
speech: Represent the time interval as a proportion.
pacedSpeech: Represent the time interval as a proportion.

title: Proportion
text: Our proportion would be $$\frac{15}{60}$$ since we want to find the average number of fish caught in $$15$$ minutes and we have information aboout $$60$$ minutes.
speech: Our proportion would be , 15 over 60,  since we want to find the average number of fish caught in  15  minutes and we have information aboout  60  minutes.
pacedSpeech: since we want to find the average number of fish caught in   15
minutes and we have information aboout   60

title: Calculate
text: Next, multiply this proportion with the average number of fish caught in an hour.
speech: Next, multiply this proportion with the average number of fish caught in an hour.
pacedSpeech: Next, multiply this proportion with the average number of fish caught in an hour.
